title: Hollywood Salutes Nicolas Cage: An American Cinematheque Tribute

sources.title: NICOLAS CAGE | FULL MOVIE | Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call New Orleans | Crime Thriller
sources.description:
Terence McDonagh (Oscar winner Nicolas Cage) is a drug- and gambling-addled detective in post-Katrina New Orleans investigating the killing of five Senegalese immigrants. Also starring Oscar nominee Brad Dourif ('One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest'), Eva Mendes ('Training Day') and Val Kilmer ('Top Gun').

#freemovies #moviesondemand #fullmovie

metadata.Plot: Hosted by the suave Samuel L. Jackson, movie and television stars gather in Beverly Hills to honor Nicolas Cage with movie clips and humorous stories about the Academy Award winning Actor.
metadata.Actors: Nicolas Cage, Samuel L. Jackson, Jim Carrey
